page.title: 04Transport in Papa westray
page.content: There are four types of transport in and out of Papa Westray,one is the plane which comes twice a day three times a week from Kirkwall on Tuesdays ,Thursdays and Saturdays. It can also be chartered. Another form of transport is the Orkney Islands Shipping Company M.V. Orcadia,which handles cargo and carries passengers.It also comes three times a week Monday,Wednesday and Friday from Kirkwall round the Islands. The Golden Marianna comes three days a week on Monday and Friday twice and once on Thursday.The Marianna is a passenger ferry between Kirkwall and Westray with a link to Papay on the school boat.The school boat goes from Westray to Papay twice each school day ;it will take passengers and it can be hired.
